runs.comm: The dry ball swings big, but on to the pads, and Amla clips it deftly to the fine leg boundary to get South Africa going
Amla drives the ball crisply towards cover where Rohit dives to take pace off the shot, Kohli pursues the ball and pulls it in
Amla drives, Amla edges, and the edge is wide enough to pass slip and fine enough to beat third man
good length on off stump, Amla stays in his crease and plays towards midwicket
good length on off and middle, Amla stays back and plays to midwicket again
punched off the back foot towards cover point, Bhuvneshwar ends the over with three dot balls
good length and straight, AB stays in his crease and plays the ball towards square leg
nudged off the pads towards midwicket, the pace on the shot is slow enough for the batsmen to take on the fielder running in from the deep and run the second
Amla stays back and works a short of a length ball off his hips towards square leg
AB's in high gear from ball no. 2! AB charges a long way out of his crease, and with a perfectly still head smashes the ball over wide long-on for the first six of the chase.
dabbed on the off side
a length ball with width outside off, too easy for AB, he stays in his crease and slashes hard at the ball, carving it over point for four
a length ball outside off, Amla drives from his crease and drives well, Rayudu dives to cut off the shot and keep the batsmen to one
Bhuvneshwar gets the ball to straighten from a good length on middle and off and squares AB up as he defends, he was looking to play that on the leg side and stopped himself
played from the crease towards midwicket
that's too full and with enough width outside off for AB to free his arms and loft the ball flat and straight
AB charges, and tries to pull, this time he's cramped for room and mis-times it, the ball lobs in the air, but falls between mid-on and midwicket
finesse from Amla, swiveling in his crease and playing a whippy pull to send the ball racing to the backward square leg boundary
a length ball on middle, AB works the ball off the pads towards deep midwicket
full and wide down leg side, AB tries to swing it towards fine leg but makes no contact
a full and straight ball, driven to midwicket, can't find the gap though
a bouncer, and AB hooks but top edges the ball over the fielder at short fine leg for a one-bounce four
short of a length outside off stump, AB stays back and slaps the ball through the small gap at cover for another boundary. South Africa are flying.
good length and straight, nudged off the pads towards square leg
Amla moves back and across and pushes a good length ball towards mid-on
AB bottom edges the attempted cut towards point, he did not have enough room to play that shot against Aravind, it was quite close to off stump
five fielders in the ring on the off side and Amla pierces the gap at cover point with a terrific back-foot square drive, plenty of room to work with
played on the off side for a single
nudged off the pads for a single behind square
a length ball outside off, slapped off the back foot towards deep cover
short ball on leg stump from over the wicket, AB moves across his crease, gets down low a little, and pulls the ball down wide of the fielder at short fine leg
good length just outside off, Amla stays in his crease and plays to point
short of a length, Amla is so well balanced as he whips the ball off his hips towards deep square leg
AB makes room by moving outside leg and punches a length ball towards deep cover
good length on middle and off stump, Amla punches towards mid on
Amla clears his front foot and slogs - not very prettily - over wide mid-on, Dhawan chases and dives head first close to the boundary but loses the pursuit
stays back this time and flicks the ball with lovely wristwork behind square leg
played off the pads on the back foot towards square
AB tries to drive through cover but the ball comes into him with the arm and he gets an inside edge on to the pad
driven to long off for a single
is that an edge? Has Dhoni dropped it? Amla tried to cut from close to off stump and got a thick edge. A really hard chance though
played off the pads towards short fine leg where Dhawan dives to save some runs
Amla leans forward and flicks through square leg
clipped off the pads to short fine leg but AB races through for one
worked off the pads through square leg
Amla moves back and across and flicks the ball off the pads through square leg
bowled flat and fast and down leg side

too straight, on the pads, flicked to deep square leg. The single went well for South Africa but then they took on Bhuvneshwar Kumar with dire consequences. Amla isn't the quickest between the wickets and the flat, accurate one-bounce throw to Ashwin caught Amla well short. Like India, SA have lost their first wicket to a run out.
driven on the front foot through cover, they race back for the second
driven on the front foot to long off for a single
that ball turns a bit and AB gets an outside edge as he tries to defend
defended into the covers
AB strides forward and drives a wide ball through cover and hits it wide enough to beat the fielder on the boundary
played through midwicket for a single
bowled slowly through the air, defended on the front foot towards cover
a leading edge! It lobs low towards short cover where Kohli dives forward full stretch but can't get there. Du Plessis had tried to close the face of the bat to play on the leg side
they steal a leg bye as the ball goes straight to short fine leg, Ashwin bowled flat and straight and it brushed the bats,an's pads
taking the pace off the ball, is Ashwin, dabbed from the crease close on the off side
strides forward to a full ball and drives firmly into the covers, but straight to the fielder
AB brings up fifty with a sublime drive off the pads that races to the deep midwicket boundary, he came forward, got to the pitch of the ball, and drove smoothly

bowled him! India have a huge wicket. Ashwin responded to that fabulous shot by bowling the ball a lot slower. AB had come out of his crease to hit the ball through midwicket and was in no position to play it, he missed and Ashwin was on target. The ball brushed AB's back thigh and deflected on to the stumps
Ashwin angles the ball into the left-hander and then spins it past the outside edge of Duminy's forward prod. That was probably the ball of the game so far.
a length ball outside off, dabbed to third man for a single
played behind square for a single

bowled him! Aravind has his first international wicket, and he leaps and punches the air in celebration! The ball slanted across the right-hander from over the wicket and kept a touch low. It was a slower ball. Du Plessis reached for it without moving his feet, trying to hit through cover. He got a thick inside edge back on to his stumps. India right back in this.
he gets a short one first up and pulls the ball into the gap at deep midwicket
played off the back foot towards square leg
good length and slow on leg and middle, defended from the crease on the leg side
bowled full and quick outside off stump, Duminy tries to play a weird sweep and gets yorked and beaten

there's an appeal for a stumping from Dhoni! Duminy looks like he has grounded his back toe in the nick of time. He had come forward to push at the ball and was beaten by Ashwin's slow pace. The third umpire is taking a while to give his decision ... and it's eventually given not out.
Duminy takes the ball from wide outside off and plays a paddle sweep behind square leg
driven to long on for a single
tossed up outside off stump, Duminy drives the ball flat over the infield at cover
steps out and swats the ball through square leg
an appeal for lbw and that looked close! Duminy came forward to turn the ball towards square and missed. Was that missing leg? Impact was outside off? Looked like neither to me, looked out.
he makes great contact this time! Lunges forward and swings hard, getting under the ball and slamming it over deep midwicket
this time he pushes forward and tries to close the face, gets a leading edge on the off side
nudges it on the leg side for a single
Behardien goes back and tries to work the ball through square, gets an leading edge on the off side
Behardien makes room by moving outside leg and drives the ball inside out to the extra cover boundary
banged in short and the ball skids on to Duminy who stays back and pulls the ball down through square
good length outside off, Behardien stays in his crease and slogs towards the leg side, makes no contact
terrific shot, gets on top of the bounce of a short ball and pulls the ball down, rolling his wrists and splitting the gap between fielders at deep backward square
punched off the back foot towards cover
short of a length outside off, Duminy hangs back and dabs the ball towards third man
Behardien makes room by moving outside leg and punches a length ball, hitting through the line, chipping it over the fielder's head at mid-off to collect a boundary
goes back and cuts the ball through point for a single
Behardien tries to reverse sweep a slower ball from Ashwin and gets a bottom edge, Dhoni fields
Behardien aims for a mighty heave towards deep midwicket but makes no contact
played to midwicket
that's a long hop, so short from Ashwin, Behardien goes right back and pulls the ball over deep midwicket
bowled full and straight, driven to long on for a single
charges down the pitch and swats across the line, he's hit it into the gap at cow corner and the ball nearly beats the fielders
dragged short by the bowler, pulled to deep backward square leg, Behardien will feel that he missed out there
bowled flat and fast outside off stump, that's a wide, Duminy let it go
Duminy makes good contact again, slogging the ball high and far over deep midwicket, finally he gets a move on
and again! That's flatter and shorter, Duminy goes back and pulls the ball flat and hard over deep midwicket
three in a row and that is a massive hit! Axar once again drops the ball short, making it easy for Duminy to free his arms and heave with power, dragging the ball from wide outside off stump
fired into the blockhole, Duminy digs it out on the leg side and begins to run, Axar moves quickly to field and Duminy has to hurry back
good length and straight, pushed towards long on for a single

a huge appeal for lbw after the yorker crashes into Duminy's boot as he misses the flick. That's absolutely plumb. Bhuvneshwar isn't usually the emotional sort but he is quite angry. They run two leg byes
inside edged to fine leg and they come back for the second
a full toss down leg side, Duminy misses the pull but that is a wide
a low full toss, Duminy whips it off his pads towards cow corner
good length just outside off, angling across Duminy who heaves across the line and is beaten
a full ball that is driven to long on, just the single
Duminy clears the man at long off! The ball was full outside off, Duminy clears his front foot and slams it flat and high enough to beat the boundary rider
an appeal for lbw but that pitched outside leg, Duminy missed the short-arm pull and was hit on the front pad by a slower ball
full and wide outside off, Behardien flays at the ball and edges it, it bounces before Dhoni who does well to collect it

a slower ball outside off, Behardien waits in his crease and punches the ball hard towards wide long off, Kohli sprints to his left and fields the ball after the first bounce and releases it quickly, keeping the batsmen to a single
the yorker, Duminy mis-times the drive but places it into a gap near mid-on, they run two before Kohli can prevent it
a full and wide ball outside off, Duminy flays at it and gets a thick outside edge that nearly carries to the fielder at short third man, the ball bounces off his body and they run a single
that was nearly in the blockhole but Duminy has played a superb shot, he gets to fifty by getting down low and drilling it hard and straight, beating the fielder at long on
that's a poor ball, he was aiming for the yorker but it finished a full toss on leg stump, Duminy gets under it and swings the ball over the deep midwicket boundary
short of a length and straight, Duminy pulls towards square for a single
Behardien swivels and tries to pull but gets beaten for pace by a skiddy ball that thuds into his body
short of a length, cramping Duminy for room, he pulls the ball down behind square for a single
Behardien backs away and tries to slog, he gets beaten and hit on the body and they run a single after the ball goes on the off side
in the blockhole, dug out on the leg side, just past the bowler and they run a single

a superb ball, in the blockhole again, but Duminy digs it out on the off side and the timing is not very good so they have the time to race back for the second, there's a direct hit at the keeper's end but Duminy is safe and he has the strike
that's the deciding shot! Aravind misses the yorker length and Duminy pulls with all his might, smashing the ball into the stands at deep midwicket. These two have added more than a 100 now!

he seals the victory by tapping the ball sensibly towards the leg side and running a single, Duminy has played a terrific innings - with a couple of helpings of luck - hitting seven sixes to go with a solitary boundary. He raises his hand in celebration and punches the air after giving South Africa the series lead
